amendment.description: To withhold certain funds for the construction of environmental infrastructure.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3820 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 12 - 84. Record Vote Number: 63.

action.text: Amendment SA 3820 proposed by Senator Flake to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2429, S2431-2432; text: CR S2429) To withhold certain funds for the construction of environmental infrastructure.
